extendedInfo.description: Conflicting nightmares will bring the darkness to haunt you - The Sanctuary is here.Amidst the fog there is a silhouette, one that John was destined to meet, not by choice - but by fate. The Sanctuary is a first-person hidden objects horror game, a tale crueler than your worst nightmares. Are you brave enough to face The Sanctuary? Then download this great adventure game and find the hidden objects for free.John was travelling alone through darkened yet majestic fog in the middle of the night. Half-asleep he continued to drive; his eyes became heavy, the darkness engulfed his vision - and then he saw... it. At the last second he tried to avoid a fatal hit, skidding, sliding... colliding. You are now in a darkened room - the door is locked and you are alone. You only remember the humanoid face that forever haunts your mind. This horror adventure will take you to places that you would never want to go in a quest to survive the terror of The Sanctuary. So many questions are left unanswered in this free application, as you work your way through 21 exciting levels - you will slowly unravel the story. Point and click game style and seek and find genre meet in this âescape the nightmareâ themed story. Secret items are everywhere and you must solve the hide and seek riddles in this adventure. Escape from the house and your mind.This exciting adventure will push your mind to new boundaries with exhilarating graphics and addictive gameplay. Work your way through the terrifying story in a quest to regain some of the answers to this dark mystery. This thrilling story will keep you on the edge of your seat as you explore the house, collect items and unravel cryptic secrets. You will investigate and search the areas very carefully. You might look for hidden objects for free or take the items that you will need later on. The Sanctuary is a game that offers you a completely unique experience. Help John to complete his quest and reveal all of his mysteries. In the game you will travel through fantastic locations and solve amazing puzzles. The story will take you through time, place, fantasy and memory. John needs answers to end this mystery and you are the only one who can help him. Play a free puzzle game like youâve never seen before. This premium application is without charge and has fun and suspense for people of all ages. It seems like invisible items play hide & seek with you, and you must escape the room full of darkness and secrets. It is the best scary game for your Android phone or tablet. The controls are point n click style so itâs very easy to play. Grab this hidden objects for free. Can you escape this madness, and the puzzles of The Sanctuary? Download it now!The Sanctuary is far - but death has never been so close.- Thrilling and powerful horror themed story.- 21 levels that contain point & click adventure and hidden objects elements.- Challenging and adrenaline-induced mystery puzzles.- Majestic yet terrifying graphics.- Music, sounds effects and speech that creates an immersive experience.Join us on Facebook: http://facebook.com/JarbullFollow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Jarbull

reviews.title: Ruffy
reviews.comment: Please continue to expand on this theme! Very fun and well done but ends too soon! 4 stars only because I wanted more! Would pay a buck or two for a much longer game. Love that there are no limitations due to needing to purchase any kind of credits. Totally free - way to go!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thanks but needs some updates
reviews.comment: Need a zoom function. Tap actions seem to miss a lot. Selected items deselect on first tap, annoying when you can\'t hit your target. Game won\'t move past the scene once you get your ticket to the planetarium. Stars for effort and price.
reviews.author: Andrew Lenik

reviews.title: Font type...
reviews.comment: Is it my phone or it\'s just the wrong font type? I don\'t know. My phone is Samsung Galaxy Mini. I can\'t read the written instructions or any of the writings on the game. It\'s very thin and small. Please revise. Thank you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Painful
reviews.comment: Game instructions not clearly defined. Clues are useless. Only good thing about it was I didn\'t pay anything for it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hmm...
reviews.comment: The graphics of the title page and the main menu page were what attracted me to this game. Those two were the best graphics of the entire game. The HOGs that had no zoom option were way too small for phone screen. Tapping all over the place on some blurred backgrounds was not exactly entertaining either. I\'m thankful that it\'s at least free.
reviews.author: Magdalen C

reviews.title: More weirdness :-/
reviews.comment: The game is fun but the words are too small to read for the clues. It needs work so when it is fixed I will give it a better rating. I apparently finished the game. Seems very odd how it ended. Not enthused at all with the game. Disappointed.
reviews.author: Steve Williams

reviews.title: Very short
reviews.comment: I thought this was a fun game.....until it ended so quickly. It was very strange how it ended. Almost like they didn\'t want to finish making the game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The sanctuary
reviews.comment: Great game.  Played well on my Let Pan tablet, lots of fun figuring out what to do.  Hint was very helpful.  Just way too short.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Short but ok
reviews.comment: Needs a zoom feature. Kinda hard to see but good game.  In the playground go to the back left get shovel and dig up grave. Grab all the things give old guy his glasses. He will give you money to buy candy. Give kid candy and get ticket. Give old guy ticket
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.comment: I was drawn to the game by the title page/ graphics, but after 10 minutes of playing, I uninstalled the game. Finding clues is impossible because everything is so small that it was a matter of clicking everywhere just hoping to find the required items. The repeated chatter of the person you are playing as quickly got on my nerves. I really thought this was going to be a good game.
reviews.author: Kat Mandu

reviews.title: Creepy and challenging
reviews.comment: Good game! A lot of detail went into the graphics and the storyline keeps you wondering. Each scene has a real Night Gallery feel to it.There needs to be more games like this
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wish it was better
reviews.comment: Has a few too many flaws.. wish it was better, looked good at 1st..
reviews.author: Jamie Parks

reviews.comment: Way to short. It was an ok game, extremely simple and ended rather abrutly, too soon. Only spent abou 10 minutes playing and it was over. Glad it was free
reviews.author: Kayla Watkins

reviews.title: Like it
reviews.comment: Beautiful game, I wish it was longer.  Id totally be willing to pay for more.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Love this game. Wish there was more. SPOILER- If you are stuck on planetarium open the bit in the middle with the red king in it where he says that he can\'t work that yet and press in the top right corner of the box. There is the key. Then you find the pieces in the chest and work out the right order to put them on the red king thing- they don\'t all come up but you won\'t need them all.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Love to play this game...lots of fun for hours. Challenging.....wish there were many more games like this one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best of it\'s type! The puzzles actually make intelligent sense!
reviews.comment: Don\'t know what the complaints are about. Beautiful scenes throughout. Actually has some character too, which is almost unheard of in a phone game. Short, but free.
reviews.author: chelsea dudley

reviews.title: One of the worse games I\'ve ever played
reviews.comment: Dark, short, trial and error. Glad I didn\'t have to pay to play.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sanctuary
reviews.comment: Is actually a good game but the story didnt quite mak e sense like how was he in the burning building?? was it another version of it him who made a different decision..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not very good
reviews.comment: Its an ok game but playing it on the phone makes it very hard to see the writing and small objects. If it were to be sized a little better for playing on phones it would be great!
reviews.author: Lin Daugherty
